1.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's, it’s 0-Dark:30, in other words it’s really,
really early. Everyone’s asleep, and all through the apartments not a creature was
stirring, not even a mouse. That is except for the chick, who turns out to be a rooster
and is crowing in the sun. Needless to say, this awakens Monica and Rachel who rush into
their living room, searching for the cause of the sound.

lines.Line:
What the hell is that?!! (to Monica) What the hell is that? Is
that you? (Monica nods her head no, and Rachel realizes what is making that sound.)
Ohhhhhhh! (storms over to Chandler and Joey’s with Monica in trail.)
Boy, you are really not a morning person

(angrily) BACK OFF!!! (She starts banging on their door.) Get up! Get
up! Get up! God damn it! Get up, get up, get up, get up, get up!
It’s the chick! She’s…going through some changes

Well the vet seems to think that’s she’s becoming a rooster.
(The rooster crows.) We’re getting a second opinion

2.SceneDescription:
The Doctor’s office, Dr. Zane is examining Phoebe as Frank and Alice
watch.

lines.Line: It looks like your uterus is ready for implantation
Oh! I knew it! I knew it! I felt really thick this morning

Well, okay, so what’s now—go get, go get the eggs, put ‘em
in there
Okay, it’ll take just a little while to prepare the embryos

Five? Okay, where am I giving birth, a hospital or a big box under the
stairs

We do five because that gives you a 25% chance that at least one will
attach

That’s it! 25 percent? That means that’s it’s like 75
percent chance of no baby at all

Hey, y’know I was thinking, what are the odds like if-if, if you
stuff like 200 of them in there
Sweety, now, she’s a woman, not a gumball machine
Sweety, now, she’s a woman, not a gumball machine
Sweety, now, she’s a woman, not a gumball machine

Okay, well y’know what, don’t worry you guys, ‘cause
I’m-I’m gonna do this as many times as it takes to get it right

Well, you see, the-the thing is, we-we only got, we kinda have one shot
to make it right

Umm, it costs $16,000 each time you do this. So, umm, we’re kinda
using all the money we have to do it just this one time

Whoa!! That—okay, that’s a lot of pressure on me and my
uterus. (to Dr. Zane) So, well okay, so is there—is maybe is there something that I
can do y’know just to like help make sure I get pregnant
Wow! You guys really don’t know anything

I know! Why don’t you get drunk! That worked for a lot of girls in
my high school

3.SceneDescription:
The Doctor’s office, Phoebe is giving a pep talk to the petrie dish
containing the embryos.

lines.Line:
Hello, tiny embryos. Well, I’m-I’m Phoebe Buffay, hi!
I’m-I’m-I’m hoping to be your uterus for the next nine months. You should
know, that we’re doing this for Frank and Alice, who you know, you’ve been
there! Umm, y’know they want you so much, so when you guys get in there, really grab
on. Okay, and-and I promise that I’ll keep you safe and warm until you’re ready
to have them take you home, so… Oh! And also, umm next time you see me, I’m
screaming, don’t worry, that’s what’s supposed to happen

4.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, continued from earlier, only slightly later.

lines.Line: Monica, betting the apartment, I don’t know about this

Rachel, I have not missed one question the whole game. I own this game!
Look at my hand. (Holds up her hand.
Why? Do you have the answers written on there
No! Steady as a rock! Now, are you with me
No! Steady as a rock! Now, are you with me
Okay. (They go into the living room.
All right, gentlemen, you’re up first
All right, gentlemen, you’re up first

You have 30 seconds. And the lightning round begins—stop it (Chandler
stops jumping)—now. What was Monica’s nickname when she was a field hockey
goalie
Correct. Rachel claims this is her favorite movie
Correct. Her actual favorite movie is..
Correct. In what part of her body did Monica get a pencil stuck at age 14

Oh! (Whispers something in Joey’s ear and then in Ross’s
ear.

Eww! No!! Her ear! All right, Monica categorizes her towels. How many
categories are there

11, unbelievable 11 is correct. (The guys celebrate.) All right,
that’s 4 for the guys. Ladies, you’re up.

lines.Character:
(As they change places, they give each other the now patented Ross maneuver. If you
don’t know what that means, click here to find out The One With Joey's New
Girlfriend
lines.Line:
As they change places, they give each other the now patented Ross maneuver. If you
don’t know what that means, click here to find out The One With Joey's New
Girlfriend.

30 seconds on the clock. 5 questions wins the game. The lightning round
begins…now! What is Joey’s favorite food
Correct. Chandler was how old when he first touched a girl’s breast
Joey, had an imaginary childhood friend. His name was
Correct! What is Chandler Bing’s job
Oh gosh, it has something to do with numbers
10 seconds, you need this or you lose the game
It’s umm, it has something to do with transponding
It’s umm, it has something to do with transponding
That’s not even a word! I can get this! I can get this

lines.Character: (Ross stops the clock, signifying the end of the lightning round
lines.Line: Ross stops the clock, signifying the end of the lightning round.

5.SceneDescription:
Chandler and Joey's, erm, Monica and Rachel's, Monica and Rachel are busy
unpacking.

lines.Line: Oh, I think I saw some in here.

lines.Character: (She opens a door and they both scream at horror at what’s inside of it
lines.Line: She opens a door and they both scream at horror at what’s inside of it.

I don’t know! But maybe if we keep that drawer shut, it’ll
die
I can’t believe we’re living here
